document.full_text: over a decade, the number of hispanic-owned companies in new york state rose 85 percent to a total of 193,200, while their sales climbed 77 percent to $18.2 billion, the state comptroller said on friday.
document.title: new york hispanic-owned firms grow swiftly: report
lines_and_colors: over a decade, the number of hispanic-owned companies in new york state rose 85 percent to a total of 193,200, while their sales climbed 77 percent to $18.2 billion, the state comptroller said on friday.
